name: HyperChroma
description:
Hi all!

This is HyperChroma, my submission for this game jam.

Hyper Chroma is a first-person shooter with a unique color-switching mechanic revolving around three colors. 

This game is largely finished, barring the soundtrack which is nonexistent.

Let me know what you think in the comments!

Controls are as follows:

Shoot: Left mouse Button, Movement: WASD, Jump: Space, Dash: Left Shift. 

This game is windows only for now due to me being unable to test on other systems.
